name: OSLogMessage
desc: An object that represents a log message.

items.name: init(extendedGraphemeClusterLiteral: String)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized to the given value.

items.name: init(stringInterpolation: OSLogInterpolation)
items.desc: Creates a log message that contains interpolated values.

items.name: init(stringLiteral: String)
items.desc: Creates a log message using a string literal.

items.name: init(unicodeScalarLiteral: String)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized to the given value.

items.name: typealias OSLogMessage.ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType
items.desc: The type that represents an extended grapheme cluster literal.

items.name: typealias OSLogMessage.StringInterpolation
items.desc: The type that receives each segment of a string literal’s interpolations.

items.name: typealias OSLogMessage.StringLiteralType
items.desc: The type that represents a string literal.

items.name: typealias OSLogMessage.UnicodeScalarLiteralType
items.desc: The type that represents a Unicode scalar literal.

items.name: var bufferSize: Int
items.desc: The byte size of the buffer that the logging system receives.

items.name: var maxOSLogArgumentCount: UInt8
items.desc: The maximum number of interpolated expressions that a log message may contain.
